response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it will bring to your life or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
